description: While running a bouncer and connecting to it using an arbitrary IRC client still works just fine, I like the ease of use Convos provides. No need for a bouncer, no need for an IRC client, just open your browser and type away (don't forget to deploy Convos though). All in all I am happy, coming from IRCCloud, Convos offers most of features IRCCloude has, without the need to pay to stay connected.
summary: Self-hosted IRC client at it's best

description: I installed it. No application to select, no icon, and nothing added in the browser, and no instructions anyplace.
